    var party = skuid.model.getModel('NGParty');

    var reportId = url.substring(url.lastIndexOf('/')+1);

    var iframeUrl = '/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=' + reportId;

        iframeUrl: iframeUrl
    });

renderer.readonly(field, value);</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="generateMessageCreditPullConfirmation" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
    $ = skuid.$;

var partyModel = skuid.model.getModel('NGParty');
var party = partyModel.data[0];

var contactModel = skuid.model.getModel('PartiesContact');
var contact = contactModel.data[0];

var appId = party.genesis__Application__c;
var partyId = contact.Id;
var partyName = party.clcommon__Account__r.Name;

var title = 'Get Credit Report of ' + partyName;
var message = '<p>Are you sure you want to get the credit report of <strong>' 
                + partyName + '</strong>?</p>';
var cancelText = "No, do not get it.";
var okText = "Yes, Continue.";
var okAction = {
    func: 'getCreditReport',
    parameters: [appId, partyId, partyName]
};

openTopLevelConfirmation({
    title: title,
    message: message,
    cancelText: cancelText,
    okText: okText,
    okAction: okAction
});
</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="LaunchCreditHistoryView" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],

    $ = skuid.$;
    
var partyRow = skuid.model.getModel('NGParty').getFirstRow();
var title = 'Copy ';
if(partyRow.clcommon__Account__r && partyRow.clcommon__Account__r.Name){
    title = title + partyRow.clcommon__Account__r.Name + ' to Applications';
}
var skuidPage = 'CopyParty';
var iframeUrl = '/apex/skuid__ui?page=' + skuidPage + '&id=' + partyRow.Id;

    title: title,
    iframeUrl: iframeUrl

    $ = skuid.$;

var partyModel = skuid.model.getModel('NGParty');
var party = partyModel.data[0];
var partyId = party.Id;
var title = 'Delete Party ';
if(party.clcommon__Account__r && party.clcommon__Account__r.Name){
    title = title + party.clcommon__Account__r.Name;
}
if(party.clcommon__Type__r && party.clcommon__Type__r.Name){
    title = title + ' ' + party.clcommon__Type__r.Name;
}
var message = '<p><strong>Are you sure you want to delete this party</strong>?</p>';
var cancelText = "Cancel";
var okText = "Yes, Continue";
var okAction = {
    func: 'deleteParty',
    parameters: [partyId]
    
};

openTopLevelConfirmation({
    title: title,
    message: message,
    cancelText: cancelText,
    okText: okText,
    okAction: okAction
});

parent.location.reload(true);</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="LaunchFinancialAccounts" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],

var party = skuid.model.getModel('NGParty').data[0];
if(party.clcommon__Account__c){
    var title = 'Financial Analysis - ' + party.clcommon__Account__r.Name;
    var skuidPage = 'AccountStatements';
    
    // get template id
    var templateRecord = skuid.model.getModel('PRD_ApplicableFinancialStatementTemplate').data[0];
    var iframeUrl = '/apex/skuid__ui?page=' + skuidPage + '&accountid=' + party.clcommon__Account__c + '&templateid=' + templateRecord.Id;
    
    openTopLevelDialog({
        title: title,
        iframeUrl: iframeUrl
    });
}

#partyDetailPageId {
    height: 848px;
}

body {
    background-color: #ebeef0;
}

body > .nx-page {
    padding: 0;
}

.image-button.money:after {
    content: 'Loan Opportunities';
}

.image-button.credit-analysis:after {
    content: 'Credit Analysis';
}

.image-button.financial-accounts:after {
    content: 'Financial Analysis';
}

.image-button.finInstitution:after {

}

.image-button.clockFire:after {

</cssitem><cssitem location="inline" name="CreditDisplay" cachelocation="false">#credit-score-number-view {
    width: 100%;
    text-align: right;
    margin-top: 20px;
    margin-bottom: 10px;
    line-height: 70px;
}

#credit-score-number-view .credit-score-bg {
    margin: 0 auto;
    font-size: 48px;
    color: white;
    background-color: #48CE94;
    padding-left: 12px;
    padding-right: 12px;
    display: inline-block;
    height: 70px;
    border-radius: 5px;
    vertical-align: middle;
}

#credit-score-simple-view {
    margin-top: 20px;
    margin-bottom: 10px;
    margin-left: 15px;
}

#credit-score-simple-view .nx-editor-header,
#credit-score-simple-view .nx-editor-contents {
    margin: 0;
}

#credit-score-simple-view .nx-item {
    white-space: nowrap;
}

#credit-score-simple-view .credit-score-row {
    height: 20px;
    margin-bottom: 5px;
    line-height: 20px;
}

#credit-score-simple-view .credit-score-row .credit-score-value {
    background-color: #7F7F7F;
    color: white;
    font-size: 11px;
    padding-left: 10px;
    padding-right: 10px;
    margin-right: 5px;
    border-radius: 3px;
    display: inline-block;
    height: 20px;
}

#credit-score-simple-view .credit-score-row .credit-score-type {
    display: inline-block;
    height: 20px;
}

#credit-score-simple-view .nx-list-footer {
    display: none;
}

#credit-report-summary .credit-report-summary-entry {
    background-color: #1CBDD4;
    margin-bottom: 10px;
    margin-left: 10px;
    padding: 5px 12px;
    border-radius: 5px;
}

#credit-report-summary .credit-report-summary-entry .nx-basicfieldeditor-item-label {
    width: 80%;
    color: white;
}

#credit-report-summary .credit-report-summary-entry .nx-field {
    width: 20%;
    text-align: right;
}

#credit-report-summary .credit-report-summary-entry .nx-field .nx-fieldtext {
    background-color: white;
    color: #1CBDD4;
    width: 20px;
    border-radius: 50%;
    text-align: center;
    display: inline-block;
    font-weight: 700;
}

#credit-score-figure {
    position: relative;
    height: 60px;
}

#credit-score-figure .credit-score-colorbar {
    position: absolute;
    top: 10px;
    left: 15px;
    bottom: 30px;
    right: 0;
    background-color: red;
}

#credit-score-figure .credit-score-colorbar-tick {
    position: absolute;
    height: 25px;
    width: 4px;
    border: 1px solid #7F7F7F;
    display: inline-block;
}

#credit-score-figure .credit-score-number-sm {
    position: absolute;
    background-color: #2D5074;
    color: white;
    font-size: 11px;
    padding: 3px 10px;
    border-radius: 3px;
    display: inline-block;
}

#credit-score-bar-wrapper {
    margin-left: 10px;
    margin-bottom: 10px;
}</cssitem></css><actionsequences uniqueid="sk-2eql-497"/></resources><styles><styleitem type="background" bgtype="color"><styles><styleitem property="background-color" value="#ebeef0"/></styles></styleitem></styles></skuidpage>
